definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: The global fast dynamics for the generalized symmetric regularized long wave equation is considered.
sentences.chinese: 考慮了對稱正則長波方程的整體快變動力學。

sentences.english: Tanning parlors emit UVA rays far more intense ly.
sentences.chinese: 人工美黑儀發出的長波紫外線要強烈得多。

sentences.english: The experimental results show that there exists a strong photovoltage signal at long wavelength bands.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果表明，在長波段有強的光電壓信號。

sentences.english: The periodic initial value problem of a class of generalized symmetric regularized long wave equations is considered.
sentences.chinese: 考慮了一類廣義的對稱正則長波方程的週期初值問題。

sentences.english: The effects of the cloud on solar radiation and longwave radiation are considered particularly.
sentences.chinese: 着重考慮了雲層對太陽輻射和大氣長波輻射的影響。

sentences.english: In this paper, we use the band model to calculate the atmospheric long-wave cooling rates.
sentences.chinese: 利用帶模式方法計算了低層大氣的長波冷卻率。

sentences.english: When the refractive index changed the moving direction, it relied on the sign of change.
sentences.chinese: 當層厚遞變時，光子帶隙均向長波方向移動。

sentences.english: The scanning testing system of IR micron-spot about MWIR and LWIR is described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了中波和長波“紅外小光點掃描測試系統”。

sentences.english: Monotone method for first order periodic boundary value problems of delay difference equations;
sentences.chinese: 考慮了一類廣義的對稱正則長波方程的週期初值問題。

sentences.english: The transformation of the large-scale circulation is mainly due to the development of ultra-long waves.
sentences.chinese: 而這類大型過程的轉變主要是由於超長波的發展。

sentences.english: Meanwhile the Midianites had sold him in Egypt to Potiphar, an official of Pharaoh, the captain of the guard.
sentences.chinese: 米甸人在埃及把約瑟賣給法老的內臣，護衛長波提乏。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, wavelet transform of percentage departures of westerlies and relative amplitudes of ultra-long wave were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 對超長波振幅及緯向風距平百分比做了小波轉換。

sentences.english: The kinetic flux vector splitting (KFVS) method was used to simulate the shallow water long wave equation.
sentences.chinese: 採用動力學的流矢量分裂法模擬淺水長波方程。

sentences.english: MF/LF communication is one of our armys important communication methods.
sentences.chinese: 中長波通信是我軍重要通信手段之一。

definition: nuée ardente/hot cloud of volcanic ash
turbid flow/muddy waters/fig. a contemptible person/fig. corrupt or disgraceful social trends
the sky/the firmament/the vault of heaven
border fort, esp. defending narrow valley
